name: Magnetism (itch)
description:
Magnetism is a small 2D, Top-Down, Arcade Brawler, where you must use techniques of attracting and repelling other magnets to bump each other into walls and become victorious as the last magnet alive!

This game was created by Reece Geofroy, as a Solo Indie Developer. This project was a challenge to see how fast I could create a game (From Concept To Published).

Total Time Spent Developing "Magnetism": 5 Hours, 40 Minutes (1 Afternoon).

All Donations from this game will go back into my Indie Game Studio for future games (Including In-Development Projects, such as Shield Shock).
